definitions.text: a small fragment of something broken off from the whole
examples: a bit of rock caught him in the eye

definitions.text: worthless material that is to be disposed of
a small piece of something that is left over after the rest has been used
examples: she jotted it on a scrap of paper
there was not a scrap left

definitions.text: the act of fighting; any contest or struggle
examples: a fight broke out at the hockey game
there was fighting in the streets
the unhappy couple got into a terrible scrap
We quarreled over the question as to who discovered America
These two fellows are always scrapping over something
scrap the old airplane and sell the parts
